translation.value: Golden Doubloon charm

original.value: <font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>Pirate Treasures</font>\nBeautiful trinket to decorate weapons\nThe trinket can be attached on weapons

translation.value: <font size='14' color='#42EBF8'>Golden Doubloon</font>\nA beautiful decoration.\nThis charm can be attached to a weapon.
<font size='14'><font color='#ff6660'>Does not improve weapon stats.</font>
